exampleDescription: This discount object represents a discount for 5 dollars off of item ID 55345, if the user purchases 4 of this item. The discount will exist from October 11th to December 11th in 2016.
This discount object represents a discount for 10 percent off item ID 55346, if the user is spending 100 dollars. The discount will exist from October 11th to December 11th in 2016.
This discount object represents a discount for 1 free item matching ID 55300, if the user buys 10 of item ID 55347. The discount will exist from October 11th to December 11th in 2016.
